system.description:
Martial Adept: You gain +1 to Warlord.

Empty Mind: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.eOIcgTpYh9394yxa]{Heightened Senses}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Keep calm and focus

  • Be mindful of the world around you
canAlways: Be mindful of the world around you.

system.description:
Roguish: You gain +1 to Shroudstalker.

Bloodthirsty: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.zcgSyG0KVz6BzCTZ]{Blood Sacrament}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Find a way in

  • Speak the language of thieves

Elemental Adept: You gain +1 to your choice of Flamespeaker, Tidecaller, Stormseeker and Duneshaper.

Mage's Friend: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.KR2CEJviLCUdgFJH]{Bind Familiar}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Perform a minor magical trick

  • Identify a spell

Warden of Life and Death: You gain +1 to your choice of Tidecaller and Deathbringer.

Divine Restoration: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.U0pM7O5jTAw0tdkb]{Restoration}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Offer a small prayer

  • Perform a minor miracle

Weapon Master: You gain +1 to one Fighting Style ability of your choice, you can change your choice for this after you complete a rest.

Warcraft: You learn any one Apprentice tier Warlord skill. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Perform a display of strength

  • Keep an eye out on the exits
canAlways: Keep an eye out on the exits.

system.description:
Nature's Warden: You gain +1 to your choice of Tidecaller and Huntmaster.

Natural Healing: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.5BZzMWgwXvnEKiDK]{Patch Up}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Find enough food for you and your party in the wilderness

  • Communicate with animals
canAlways: Find enough food for you and your party in the wilderness.

system.description:
Elemental Adept: You gain +1 to your choice of Flamespeaker, Tidecaller, Stormseeker and Duneshaper.

Elemental Sorcery: You learn one skill belonging to the school of the ability you increased with this feature. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Lean on your innate magic

  • Perform a minor magical trick

Brutal: You gain +1 to Warlord.

Divine Fortification: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.gbume9fvFJZtRXt3]{Fortify}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Offer someone the benefit of the doubt

  • Ask: "Do you need a hand?"
canAlways: Offer someone the benefit of the doubt.

system.description:
Master of the Hunt: You gain +1 to Huntmaster.

Hunter Adept: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.rFnQDblsaLLg2PDn]{Huntsman's Mark}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Find a path forward through nature

  • Find enough food for you and your party in the wilderness
canAlways: Find a path forward through nature.
Find enough food for you and your party in the wilderness.

system.description:
Forbidden Magic: You gain +1 to Deathbringer

Patron's Familiar : You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.KR2CEJviLCUdgFJH]{Bind Familiar}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

When using it, instead of binding a familiar normally, your patron offers you a spirit that takes the form of a creature your patron wishes, serving as a bridge between you and your patron.

You can always…

  • Reach out to your patron, in a plea for guidance

  • Strike a deal
canAlways: Reach out to your patron, in a plea for guidance.

system.description:
Elemental Adept: You gain +1 to your choice of Flamespeaker, Tidecaller, Stormseeker and Duneshaper.

Astral Diviner: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.mggIHvTALbr1xAxH]{Augury}You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Use the stars to navigate

  • Perform a minor magical trick

Amissio Adept: You gain +1 to Voidcantor

Envoy of the Void: You learn one Apprentice Voidcantor skill. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Communicate telepathically with a creature nearby, so long as you share a language

  • Manipulate small objects with your mind
canAlways: Communicate telepathically with a creature nearby, so long as you share a language.
Manipulate small objects with your mind.

system.description:
Master of Death: You gain +1 to Deathbringer.

Voice of the Dead: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.nZAuu0OqdLZRwgaD]{Speak with Dead}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Find yourself comfortable amongst death

  • Remind those around you that you would prefer them dead
canAlways: Remind those around you that you would prefer them dead.

system.description:
Brutal: You gain +1 to Heavy-Handed.

Born to Rage: You learn the skill @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.Y418PUi56IfSGFhD]{Rage}. You always have it memorized, it doesn't count against your skills known or memorized and you don't need to meet its requirements.

You can always…

  • Perform a display of strength

  • Get angry
